goals.description: Search for "playwright browser testing" and then click on one of the search results
transcript: [2026-01-06T12:07:22.897Z] Thought: I need to search for playwright browser testing. I can see there's a search input field where I can type my query.

[2026-01-06T12:07:36.476Z] Thought: I've typed my search query and I can see it in the search box. Now I need to click the Search button to get my results.
